meta.name: Radical Etymology Reference
meta.description: Historical evolution of the 50 most common radicals from oracle bone to modern forms
meta.purpose: Create etymologically ACCURATE mnemonics, not folk etymologies
meta.key_insight: The 'Clerical Shift' (lìbiàn) during Han Dynasty flattened pictorial curves into abstract strokes

critical_disconnects.description: Radicals where modern form is visually disconnected from original meaning - MUST understand these

moon_vs_flesh.problem: 月 (moon) and 肉 (flesh) look identical in modern scripts

moon.original: Crescent moon with internal lines representing glow

flesh.original: Cut slab of meat showing ribs/muscle texture

moon_vs_flesh.shift: Clerical script straightened the 'ribs' of meat to look like 'glow' of moon
moon_vs_flesh.mnemonic_rule: LEFT or BOTTOM = Flesh (body parts: 肝 liver, 背 back, 胃 stomach). RIGHT = Moon (time/light: 明 bright, 期 period)
moon_vs_flesh.story_implication: When writing body part mnemonics, describe MEAT/RIBS, not moonlight

left_ear_vs_right_ear.problem: 阝 means two different things based on position

left_ear.original: Vertical steps cut into a cliff / terraced mound

right_ear.original: Kneeling person below a walled enclosure

left_ear_vs_right_ear.story_implication: Check position before writing story - hill vs city completely different imagery

walking_radical.original: 彳 (street/intersection) + 止 (foot/footprint) = foot walking on street
walking_radical.shift: Street (彳) reduced to dots, foot (止) smoothed into curved tail
walking_radical.mnemonic: Dots are FOOTPRINTS; sweeping tail is the PATH

four_dots_fire_vs_tail.problem: Usually fire (火) flattened, BUT for animals it's legs/tail
four_dots_fire_vs_tail.mnemonic: Check context: cooking = FIRE, creature = LEGS/TAIL
four_dots_fire_vs_tail.story_implication: Don't describe 馬 (horse) as 'horse on fire' - it's horse with LEGS

top_50_radicals.note: 氵 is the spray/droplets of the river
Became square due to carving difficulty. Distinct from 'Enclosure' (larger square)
扌: Fingers straightened into crossbar; wrist became vertical hook
Top stroke = branches; Bottom diagonals = roots
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Tree with roots digging down, branches reaching up

top_50_radicals.note: 亻: Compressed profile view (single standing line)
忄: 'Standing heart.' Dots = arteries; Vertical = main chamber
Sound funneling from the mouth
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Words pouring from an open mouth

top_50_radicals.note: Became rectangular to fit grid. Dot remains as middle line
Bottom dots/lines represent frayed ends of raw silk
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Twisted silk threads with frayed ends

top_50_radicals.note: DISCONNECTED: Merged visually with Moon. See critical_disconnects

top_50_radicals.oracle_origin: Mound of clay on potter's wheel / altar
top_50_radicals.note: Represents ground or raw material
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Mound of clay ready for shaping

top_50_radicals.note: Depicts ancient posture of deference or domestic work
DISCONNECTED: Two sprouts merged into single crossbar in simplified
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Twin green sprouts pushing through soil

top_50_radicals.note: The 'chimney' dot is the ridgepole of the house
Open split of shell shown at bottom
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Cowrie shell used as ancient money

top_50_radicals.note: DISCONNECTED: See critical_disconnects.walking_radical
DISCONNECTED: 灬 is base of cooking fire. BUT for animals = legs/tail
刂: Vertical view of blade edge and spine
Meaning shifted from 'tool' to 'effort' used to wield it
Often implies repetition
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Right hand reaching again and again

top_50_radicals.note: DISCONNECTED: 钅 is cursive simplification of mold/ore
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Molten metal being cast, gold nuggets

top_50_radicals.note: 衤: Distinct from Spirit (礻). Has 2 dots (folds of cloth), not 1
Originally 'snake,' generalized to all crawling creatures/worms
LEFT EAR = Terrain, elevation. See critical_disconnects
RIGHT EAR = Cities, administration. See critical_disconnects

top_50_radicals.oracle_origin: Frontal view of man, arms spread
top_50_radicals.note: 'Person' is profile; 'Big' is frontal (occupying maximum space)
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Person spreading arms wide - I'M THIS BIG

top_50_radicals.note: Divided, minute particles
Roof + one wall (open structure), unlike 宀 (enclosed)
Originally 'personator' - living representative of dead ancestor at ritual
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Still body, person playing dead in ritual

top_50_radicals.oracle_origin: Hand with mark at the pulse
top_50_radicals.note: Distance from wrist to pulse = one 'inch' (pulse taking)
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Doctor's fingers on wrist, measuring pulse

top_50_radicals.note: DISCONNECTED: Rotated 90° vertical; pupil became two middle lines
Top box = kneecap; bottom = foot
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Foot and lower leg, ready to walk

top_50_radicals.note: Pictograph of furrowed farmland
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Flooded rice paddies in grid pattern

top_50_radicals.note: A rock falling from/lying under a cliff

top_50_radicals.oracle_origin: Stalk with drooping ear of grain
top_50_radicals.note: 'Tree' with heavy top (grain head)
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Grain stalk bowing under weight of harvest

top_50_radicals.note: DISCONNECTED: ⺮ compresses stalks into small distinct caps
Dots represent scattered grains
Left side = bed; dots = sweat/illness
Half of the 'walk' intersection. Implies walking/loitering
Cloth draped over a rod
Complex origin; often associated with 'direction' or 'frontier'
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Square compass pointing in four directions

top_50_radicals.oracle_origin: Infant with large head, swaddled legs
top_50_radicals.note: Pictograph of a baby
Central box = carriage; top/bottom lines = wheels/axle
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Chariot viewed from above, wheels spinning

top_50_radicals.note: Tool used for masonry/building
Top line = heaven/sky; dots = rain
Focuses on face/head (distinct from 'flesh' body parts)
top_50_radicals.mnemonic_image: Prominent head on a kneeling figure

top_50_radicals.note: Pictograph of the dagger-axe
Container for food
See critical_disconnects.moon_vs_flesh
'Person' (top) + 'foot' (bottom). Implies fast motion

story_writing_rules.use_original_images: When possible, describe the oracle bone / pictographic origin, not the abstract modern form
story_writing_rules.respect_disconnects: For the 4 critical disconnects, always use etymologically correct imagery

examples.wrong: The moon radical in 肝 (liver) glows at night
examples.right: The meat/ribs radical in 肝 (liver) shows the bloody flesh of the organ
